title: Is This a Prescription Written for Elvis One Day Before He Died?
subtitle: Elvis’s doctor faced immense criticism over his excessive prescription practices, but it's unlikely he would have misspelled his own name on a pad with the wrong ZIP code.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A photograph shows a prescription for several stimulants, sedatives, and narcotic painkillers issued to singer Elvis Presley the day before he died.
